title: Week 4 Day 1 #LCS discussion
body:
[Today's schedule](http://na.lolesports.com/schedule/) - watch at lolesports.com

FNATIC (7-1) vs Alliance (2-6)

Millenium (2-5 vs ROCCAT (5-3)

Copenhagen Wolves (3-5) vs Gambit Gaming (6-2)

Supa Hot Crew (3-5) vs Millenium (2-5) 

Discuss the matches, picks, bans and more below!

replies.body: Two games and two Pantheon picks? It's raining men!
I've really enjoyed the Panth picks this split. It's refreshing.
Mandrops! Mandrops everywhere!
I really think Alliance is gonna take this game!
Dunno man, FNC is looking pretty strong this game.
Alliance looks like they brought their best game today. Shook's ganks on the mid lane have been spot on! I'm rooting for The LeBlanc pick though.
Alliance is looking pretty strong! Can't ever count FNC out though. Everyone remembers the Kassadin back door!
I think FNC looks good even in losses haha. But Froggen seems to be on his A game today and I just think it's know or never for Alliance to prove they can compete.
First Blood for Alliance at least makes this more possible, although the gold lead is only 200g.

Mid Lulu? Mid Thresh?????

Edit: Mid Lulu!!
:O gasp! Gambit is crazy....
I'm just excited to see more Leblanc play tbh

Oh god!
Aranea almost died to the golems. Soooo close!
That dive too! Seems the spider couldn't kill the Gator :(
Yeah. It's a bit of a shame that this id not work out. But in the end, the better team seems to be winning (42 min in). Although I would really like to see more Tristanas or Lulus.
I would pay to see an all yordle team...
Top Lane {{champion:7}} , I like it.
Crazy invade wtf?
Go Go Fnatic!!

first GG

Nah but for real, this could be a great new thing!
This Evelyn build is golden!
I get worried every time I see Ziggs vs. Gragas, it never seems to go well for the Ziggs :(
Called it! haha. Great game by Alliance. I hope they keep this level of play up!
Peke turning around ftl during the teamfight in the midlane. Was a favourable fight for fnatic until then...

My picks for today's games are - 

Alliance, Roccat, Gambit, and Supa Hot Crew.
Will wickd build Trinity Force?
He is not playing {{champion:54}}, so no.
let's see how fnatic's double-AP strat's gonna work out. Their invade didn't really work well as a start...
I hate pauzes :(
